pageContent: Objective: To define the type of orgasmic dysfunction in men after radical prostatectomy (RP), as absence of orgasm and orgasmic pain are recognized complaints, and changes in orgasm may lead to significant sexual dissatisfaction.

metaData.source:
Sexuality in patients undergoing haematopoietic stem cell transplantation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22083720/
